pages.text: Sometimes you don't want to use any fancy weapons and really just want to toss things at your enemy.$(br)This is the dilemma that $(thing)throwable weapons$() aims to solve.$(br2)$(thing)Throwable weapons$() are the simplest type of ranged weapon. Simply hold one in your hand, then right-click to toss it at speed at your intended target.
pages.title: Throwables

pages.text: Each $(thing)thrown weapon$() has its own unique characteristics, offering situational advantages that other weapons may not provide.$(br2)If nothing else, they offer an extremely quick and convenient source of damage, and are often fairly inexpensive to obtain.$(br)Need something done quick and dirty? $(thing)Throwable weapons$() are the way to go.
Find info on all of the $(thing)thrown weapons$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
